# The Modern EOR for Staffing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ae75c54e9b4399830b0652/6674fc9bce993dfe05004c45_Add%20a%20heading%20\(3\).png)
Ascen provides employer of record, payroll services, and back office for staffing organizations.
[Arrow RightFind the perfect solution for you](https://ascen.com/</products-services>)

### Back office built for staffing
Ascen provides back office and employer of record (EOR) services for companies engaging contingent talent. Ascen works with staffing firms, recruitment agencies, and talent platforms.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ae75c54e9b4399830b0652/65afaef118d9ae9f1fd9a138_icon_4.svg)
### All-in-one solution
Ascen's platform provides onboarding, background checks, workers' comp insurance, benefits, payroll and funding, timesheet and expense management, invoicing and collections, all in one system.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ae75c54e9b4399830b0652/65afae07e1e5742c93eeacaf_icon_3.svg)
### Designed for your growth
Our all-in-one employer of record solution is designed to let you focus on growth, integrating into dozens of ATS and Accounting software, and offering an open API.

Employer of Record 
### EOR Built for Staffing
Ascen steps in as the legal employer of record (EOR) of your candidates. We handle compliant onboarding, payroll, benefits, and workers' compensation insurance, in an affordable, pay-as-you-go solution, to allow you to grow effortlessly. Ascen works in all US States, Canada, and selected countries globally. 
  * EOR built for staffing organizations
  * White-label all-in-one platform, with embedded financing available
  * Works in all US States, Canada, and selected countries globally
  * Coverage for Professional, Healthcare, and Light Industrial workers' compensation codes
  * API Connection for Staffing and Gig platforms


[Explore moreArrow Right](https://ascen.com/</ps/employer-of-record>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/665ecd46e6ea688a3b5274a2_EOR.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/665ecd46e6ea688a3b5274a2_EOR.svg)
Agent of Record
### Agent of Record/IC Compliance
Ascen partners with Staffing Agencies to act as their trusted Agent of Record (AOR) for the independent contractors (ICs) they place. Using advanced workers classification techniques, Ascen ensures Independent Contractors are correctly classified. As an AOR, Ascen oversees: 
  * Timesheet management
  * Global IC payments in USD and local currencies
  * Contractor onboarding (W-9, W-8BEN) and document management
  * IC compliance and indemnification
  * End client invoicing and collection


‍
‍
[Explore moreArrow Right](https://ascen.com/</ps/agent-of-record>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/668268af403ad700f242ecc2_compliance.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/668268af403ad700f242ecc2_compliance.svg)
White Label Pay and Bill Software
### White Label Payroll and Billing Built for Staffing
Whether you are using Ascen's EOR or running payroll under your own tax entity, all of Ascen's customers benefit from our pay and bill platform purpose-built for staffing. Our software is comprehensive for managing your temporary staffing business and includes:
  * Onboarding
  * Timesheets Management and Approvals
  * Payroll
  * Invoicing
  * Reporting
  * Learning Management 
  * Credentialing
  * Document Signing and Management


Other payroll and EOR providers are built for end clients hiring permanent workers. Ascen's software is built for staffing organizations onboarding, managing, and billing for contingent workers at scale. Whether you are a new recruitment startup or established platform, Ascen will allow you to automate your critical pay and bill functions, in a fully white-label environment which empowers staffing partners to keep their brand front and center. 
[Explore moreArrow Right](https://ascen.com/</ps/pay-and-bill-software>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/665dd00e537be1c296b3bcd8_whitelabel.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/665dd00e537be1c296b3bcd8_whitelabel.svg)
Onboarding & Screening
### Onboarding & Screening
With Ascen's worker portal, improve the contractor onboarding experience and easily manage onboarding requirements for employees and independent contractors. 
Ascen's mobile-friendly onboarding experience handles:
  * I-9 verifications
  * W-4 tax withholdings
  * Background Checks & Drug Tests
  * Credentialing (Healthcare) 
  * Benefits
  * Rules-Based Agreement Management


Ascen has multiple background and drug screening providers built into the onboarding process so you will always be able to adhere to your client background screening requirements.
With reminders for workers, onboarding status pages, and alerts to your team, your operations team will always know exactly where you workers stand during onboarding.
‍
[Explore moreArrow Right](https://ascen.com/</ps/employer-of-record>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/665ecd37394032ca49b67113_onboarding.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/665ecd37394032ca49b67113_onboarding.svg)
Payroll Funding
### Payroll Funding
Staffing requires high capital amounts to support payroll prior to clients paying invoices. With Ascen's integrated payroll funding solution, ensure timely contractor payments and avoid cash flow problems. 
While customers are not required to use our embedded payroll funding option, some benefits include:
  * Minimize Manual Effort of Uploading Invoices to Factoring
  * No Personal Guarantees or Liens
  * Cheaper, flat pricing versus factoring
  * Built-in AR and collections management
  * Credit and work-out management
  * Multi-currency support 


[Explore moreArrow Right](https://ascen.com/</ps/employer-of-record>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/665ecd005c58db2dcffbbcfd_payroll%20funding.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/665ecd005c58db2dcffbbcfd_payroll%20funding.svg)
Timesheets and Expenses
### Timesheets and Expenses
Managing client timesheet and expense approvals is one of the most difficult aspects of running a successful staffing organization. Ascen's white-label timesheets and expenses module is built specifically for high-growth staffing organizations with modern approval flows built right in. Ascen's timesheet and expense management includes:
  * White Label Timesheet and Expense Candidate Portal 
  * One-click and no-click approvals for clients (no-login required)
  * Automated entry and approval reminders for clients and candidates
  * White Label client timesheet dashboard with complex permissions
  * Automatically sync time and expenses to payroll with overtime rules and complex billing rules


‍
[Explore moreArrow Right](https://ascen.com/</ps/employer-of-record>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/665eccf139734626360d7f27_timesheets.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c4ab81f7a7d409ff3a39d3/665eccf139734626360d7f27_timesheets.svg)
API and Integrations
### API and Integrations
## REST API
Running a staffing organization at scale requires automation and Ascen was purpose-built for tech-forward staffing companies in an API-first design.
Create custom integrations with Ascen using our REST API with full coverage of endpoints that exist within our web user interface. Examples of integration possibilities using Ascen's API include:
  * Embed onboarding components into your custom application
  * Pull paychecks and other data into your application
  * Submit and manage assignments with the API
  * Create and update timesheets and expenses through the API


## ATS and Accounting Integrations
Connect your ATS and Accounting Systems with Ascen by using our pre-built integrations to various staffing-focused ATS providers and popular accounting software such as Quickbooks, Xero, and Netsuite. With Ascen's integrations you can create an all-on-one solution for your business and avoid manual bookkeeping and administration errors.

### Payroll Funding
Staffing requires high capital amounts to support payroll prior to clients paying invoices. With Ascen's integrated payroll funding solution, ensure timely contractor payments and avoid cash flow problems. 
While customers are not required to use our embedded payroll funding option, some benefits include:
  * Minimize Manual Effort of Uploading Invoices to Factoring
  * No Personal Guarantees or Liens
  * Cheaper, flat pricing versus factoring
  * Built-in AR and collections management
  * Credit and work-out management
  * Multi-currency support

### Timesheets and Expenses
Managing client timesheet and expense approvals is one of the most difficult aspects of running a successful staffing organization. Ascen's white-label timesheets and expenses module is built specifically for high-growth staffing organizations with modern approval flows built right in. Ascen's timesheet and expense management includes:
  * White Label Timesheet and Expense Candidate Portal 
  * One-click and no-click approvals for clients (no-login required)
  * Automated entry and approval reminders for clients and candidates
  * White Label client timesheet dashboard with complex permissions
  * Automatically sync time and expenses to payroll with overtime rules and complex billing rules

### Back office built for staffing
Ascen provides back office and employer of record (EOR) services for companies engaging contingent talent. Ascen works with staffing firms, recruitment agencies, and talent platforms.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ae75c54e9b4399830b0652/65afaef118d9ae9f1fd9a138_icon_4.svg)
### All-in-one solution
Ascen's platform provides onboarding, background checks, workers' comp insurance, benefits, payroll and funding, timesheet and expense management, invoicing and collections, all in one system.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ae75c54e9b4399830b0652/65afae07e1e5742c93eeacaf_icon_3.svg)
### Designed for your growth
Our all-in-one employer of record solution is designed to let you focus on growth, integrating into dozens of ATS and Accounting software, and offering an open API.

### EOR Built for Staffing
Ascen steps in as the legal employer of record (EOR) of your candidates. Ascen works in all US States, Canada, and selected countries globally.

  * White-label all-in-one platform, with embedded financing available

  * Coverage for Professional, Healthcare, and Light Industrial workers' compensation codes
  * API Connection for Staffing and Gig platforms

Agent of Record
### Agent of Record/IC Compliance
Ascen partners with Staffing Agencies to act as their trusted Agent of Record (AOR) for the independent contractors (ICs) they place. Using advanced workers classification techniques, Ascen ensures Independent Contractors are correctly classified. As an AOR, Ascen oversees: 
  * Timesheet management
  * Global IC payments in USD and local currencies
  * Contractor onboarding (W-9, W-8BEN) and document management
  * IC compliance and indemnification
  * End client invoicing and collection

White Label Pay and Bill Software
### White Label Payroll and Billing Built for Staffing
Whether you are using Ascen's EOR or running payroll under your own tax entity, all of Ascen's customers benefit from our pay and bill platform purpose-built for staffing. Our software is comprehensive for managing your temporary staffing business and includes:
  * Onboarding
  * Timesheets Management and Approvals
  * Payroll
  * Invoicing
  * Reporting
  * Learning Management 
  * Credentialing
  * Document Signing and Management


Other payroll and EOR providers are built for end clients hiring permanent workers. Ascen's software is built for staffing organizations onboarding, managing, and billing for contingent workers at scale. Whether you are a new recruitment startup or established platform, Ascen will allow you to automate your critical pay and bill functions, in a fully white-label environment which empowers staffing partners to keep their brand front and center.

  * I-9 verifications
  * W-4 tax withholdings
  * Background Checks & Drug Tests
  * Credentialing (Healthcare) 
  * Benefits
  * Rules-Based Agreement Management


Ascen has multiple background and drug screening providers built into the onboarding process so you will always be able to adhere to your client background screening requirements.
With reminders for workers, onboarding status pages, and alerts to your team, your operations team will always know exactly where you workers stand during onboarding.

### White Label Payroll and Billing Built for Staffing
Whether you are using Ascen's EOR or running payroll under your own tax entity, all of Ascen's customers benefit from our pay and bill platform purpose-built for staffing. Our software is comprehensive for managing your temporary staffing business and includes:
  * Onboarding
  * Timesheets Management and Approvals
  * Payroll
  * Invoicing
  * Reporting
  * Learning Management 
  * Credentialing
  * Document Signing and Management


Other payroll and EOR providers are built for end clients hiring permanent workers. Ascen's software is built for staffing organizations onboarding, managing, and billing for contingent workers at scale. Whether you are a new recruitment startup or established platform, Ascen will allow you to automate your critical pay and bill functions, in a fully white-label environment which empowers staffing partners to keep their brand front and center.

### Onboarding & Screening
With Ascen's worker portal, improve the contractor onboarding experience and easily manage onboarding requirements for employees and independent contractors. 
Ascen's mobile-friendly onboarding experience handles:
  * I-9 verifications
  * W-4 tax withholdings
  * Background Checks & Drug Tests
  * Credentialing (Healthcare) 
  * Benefits
  * Rules-Based Agreement Management


Ascen has multiple background and drug screening providers built into the onboarding process so you will always be able to adhere to your client background screening requirements.
With reminders for workers, onboarding status pages, and alerts to your team, your operations team will always know exactly where you workers stand during onboarding.

### Payroll Funding
Staffing requires high capital amounts to support payroll prior to clients paying invoices. With Ascen's integrated payroll funding solution, ensure timely contractor payments and avoid cash flow problems. 
While customers are not required to use our embedded payroll funding option, some benefits include:
  * Minimize Manual Effort of Uploading Invoices to Factoring
  * No Personal Guarantees or Liens
  * Cheaper, flat pricing versus factoring
  * Built-in AR and collections management
  * Credit and work-out management
  * Multi-currency support

### Timesheets and Expenses
Managing client timesheet and expense approvals is one of the most difficult aspects of running a successful staffing organization. Ascen's white-label timesheets and expenses module is built specifically for high-growth staffing organizations with modern approval flows built right in. Ascen's timesheet and expense management includes:
  * White Label Timesheet and Expense Candidate Portal 
  * One-click and no-click approvals for clients (no-login required)
  * Automated entry and approval reminders for clients and candidates
  * White Label client timesheet dashboard with complex permissions
  * Automatically sync time and expenses to payroll with overtime rules and complex billing rules

### API and Integrations
## REST API
Running a staffing organization at scale requires automation and Ascen was purpose-built for tech-forward staffing companies in an API-first design.
Create custom integrations with Ascen using our REST API with full coverage of endpoints that exist within our web user interface. Examples of integration possibilities using Ascen's API include:
  * Embed onboarding components into your custom application
  * Pull paychecks and other data into your application
  * Submit and manage assignments with the API
  * Create and update timesheets and expenses through the API


## ATS and Accounting Integrations
Connect your ATS and Accounting Systems with Ascen by using our pre-built integrations to various staffing-focused ATS providers and popular accounting software such as Quickbooks, Xero, and Netsuite. With Ascen's integrations you can create an all-on-one solution for your business and avoid manual bookkeeping and administration errors.

generated_description:
Ascen is a Boston-based startup founded in 2018, currently operating with a nimble team of 17. This company emerged as a back-office platform and employer of record (EOR) specifically catering to the staffing industry. Ascen is a proud participant of Y Combinator's Batch W19, which adds a layer of credibility to its innovative offerings.

The core mission of Ascen is straightforward: to act as an employer of record for staffing firms, allowing those firms to focus on their core business. The services provided by Ascen cover a broad spectrum. They offer not just EOR services but also payroll funding, compliance solutions, and a comprehensive pay-and-bill software tailored for staffing agencies. Ascen has designed its platform to be an all-in-one solution that integrates easily with various Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and other software.

What does this mean for staffing firms? They can utilize Ascen's solutions to streamline several operational headaches—everything from onboarding, background checks, and payroll to invoicing and compliance. By offering a white-label product, Ascen empowers staffing agencies to maintain their branding while automating back-office functions. 

Ascen's offerings are grouped into three primary products:
1. **Employer of Record (EOR)** - This service ensures compliant onboarding, payroll, and other benefits as Ascen acts as the legal employer of the staffing firm's candidates.
2. **Agent of Record (AOR)** - Here, Ascen helps manage independent contractor compliance, ensuring proper classification and overseeing payments.
3. **Pay and Bill Software** - This allows staffing companies to manage all their payroll and billing needs under one roof, maintaining control over their operations.

With tags like 'SaaS', 'B2B', 'compliance', and 'HR-tech', Ascen is positioned at the intersection of technology and human resources, aiming to simplify complex staffing processes. Their ongoing commitment is to evolve further, integrating more solutions that can adapt to the shifting landscape of the staffing industry.

For more details, you can explore their offerings on [Ascen's official website](https://ascen.com).
